translations.gmp: NutriPharCo is a biotech company born to provide active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) supply solutions for the global pharmaceutical, cosmetic and food industries. We offer products complying with the highest and most prestigious quality standards worldwide, EU GMP.
translations.description: Our hybrid society aims to merge the agricultural industry in one of the most fertile sectors for cannabis cultivation, with our state-of-the-art extraction plant and laboratory, in which we will have a clean and efficient process.
